details: A stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnherability in the bulletin board (SchwarzeBrett) in adata Software GmbH Mitarbeiter Portal 2.15.2.0 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the web browser of other users via manipulation of the 'Inhalt' parameter of the '/SchwarzeBrett/Nachrichten/CreateNachricht' or '/SchwarzeBrett/Nachrichten/EditNachricht/' requests.
